name: Splash Racing
description:
Splash Racing is unique game, where your aim is to color whole city into color. You have to drive your way throw the city, you are chased by police. There are 10 different levels to pick and you can pick from 9 cars. You have to collect coins that are located in every level. The more coins you have, the more options to buy cars. Your car will make color stains every metr it goes. Police will try to crash your car, so drive as fast as possible. It's time to splash this world with color.


- 9 cars to pick
- 10 different levels
- nice graphics and cool sounds
